This option cannot be enabled at this moment, because hasn't been disabled.
Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS)
Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA)
You can only enable one option.

The following rules apply for security options (PCI DSS, HDS and HIPAA):
Only one option can be enabled
The NSX and vROps options must be enabled.
The PCC must have at least one authorised IP address, and must have restricted access.
The administrator must have a mobile number, an email address, and they must also be the token validator.
The NSX and vROps options must be activated on your infrastructure:
Your infrastructure must have restricted access and have at least one authorized IP address.
At least your "admin" user must have a mobile phone number and email address, and they must be the "token validator".
Users who can validate tokens by SMS:
